    updateApplianceItem(ApplianceItem) - Method in class homeappliance.ApplianceItemDAO

    updateProduct(HomeAppliance) - Method in class homeappliance.HomeApplianceDAO
    Updates the details of an existing product in the database which updates all the attributes of the product (except the ID).
    UpdateProductHandler - Class in homeappliance.web
